summary.Title: Traffic Consultant, Fgura FGR, Malta (413727)
summary.Presentation: AIS Environment, Fgura FGR, Malta, is looking for a Traffic Consultant.Definite contract.Job description:traffic studies design and coordinationtr

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
AIS Environment, Fgura FGR, Malta, is looking for a Traffic Consultant.

Definite contract.

Job description:
  • traffic studies design and coordination
  • traffic modelling and data analysis by using the specialised software compilation of scientific technical reports for traffic impact assessments, traffic statements and green travel plans
  • presentation of technical outcomes of reports to clients, architects and governmental bodies leading traffic projects


Qualifications:

First degree in traffic management or equivalent

Required Skills:
  • Confident user of Junctions 11 (PICADY and ARCADY) or other software modelling tools
  • Professional technical report writing skills in English
  • Independent user of traffic modelling software and GIS mapping software
  • Experience in traffic assessments
  • Great communication and presentation skills
  • Capable of working in a dynamic multi-sectoral team
  • Independent user of Microsoft 365
  • Driving licence


Training provided

On the job training

Any assistance with accommodation/relocation

None

Any other benefits

Health insurance, Special summer hours

Salary

28000 - 32000 Euro, per annum

How will the interviews be held

Online or in person

To apply

CVs and a covering email are to be sent by email to eures.recruitment.jobsplus@gov.mt and should be written in English. Please quote the vacancy name Traffic Consultant and number 413727 in your email.

Latest application date is 20.02.2025

(from EURES Malta)
